features.featureTitle: Redesign the sound toggle/change button in the Settings page with a new visually appropriate design. The button should clearly communicate its function (sound control) through iconography and styling. Replace the existing button UI with the new design while preserving the underlying sound enable/disable and custom sound upload functionality from useClickSound.ts.

Replace the previously planned premium access codes 987789 and 879987 with 4 new well-designed codes in PremiumModal.tsx. All 4 new codes must work exactly like the existing code 987987 — granting full premium access when entered. The original code 987987 must remain valid. Generate the 4 new codes following a consistent, memorable pattern.

Add a unit selector to quantity/measurement input fields in the AddSale page and ProductList page. Next to each quantity input field, display a small icon/button. Clicking this icon opens a dropdown with unit options: gram, kg, liter. The displayed unit labels must respect the current app language — showing Bengali labels (গ্রাম, কেজি, লিটার) when Bengali is active, and English labels (gram, kg, liter) when English is active, using the existing LanguageContext and translations system. The selected unit should be stored alongside the quantity value.
Add translation keys for the unit selector options (gram, kg, liter in both English and Bengali) to the translations object in frontend/src/locales/translations.ts.
